Comments_List: This course provided a broad overview of "collapse", particularly in regard to the 2200 BC drought.

Professor Weiss's broad knowledge about this topic is the major strength of this course. He also assigned excellent readings and included questions to consider while doing the readings. This really helped guide my interpretation of the literature and ,y understanding of the concept of collapse. This course could be improved if the format deviated from the traditional lecture style.
I would recommend this class to archaeology students who are looking to broaden their perspective on collapse.
